InteractableObjects.name: Tombstone
frases: You wake up, but don't remember what happened. You just see this tombstone and a portal.
Somehow you know that you need to enter in it...

InteractableObjects.name: Tombstone
frases: In your head you hear: "By transiting between portals, you can get to other places and save her..."

InteractableObjects.name: Throne of the king
frases: You see the empty throne, and remember that there is an exit from this place somewhere.
You don't remember who was the king, but you know that something bad happened.
